Remarks: Shalene Rose - 510-381-3117 - Welcome to 3120 Hyde Street, located in the convergence of Oakland's vibrant Fruitvale & Patten neighborhoods, this charming 3 bed/2 bath/1,716 sqft Spanish Revival home features a bright open layout, complete w/ a formal dining room, a stylish kitchen w/ charming vintage stove, & checkerboard flooring, and a cozy breakfast nook. Enjoy the original brick fireplace, vaulted ceilings in the living room, pretty French doors out to the balcony, built-in cabinet w/ stained glass windows in the nook, contemporary light fixtures, & beautiful wood floors throughout. Upper bedrooms receive ample light & have large closets. Both bathrooms have been tastefully updated. Downstairs bedroom is flexible in usage and features ornamental wood paneling. Plenty of storage options given the large basement, oversized laundry room, & an internally accessible 2-car garage. Large backyard features a decomposed granite patio & charming stone pathways & drought resistant plants. The yard is ready for play, BBQs, & gardening. Located on a quiet cul-de-sac close to Sausal Creek, within close proximity to a variety of local grocery stores, shops, restaurants,& amenities. This home offers the best of both worlds, a sweet & spacious sanctuary in a convenient location.Near highways 580/880, Transbay bus, BART.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Leigh M Schneider - 510-390-0857 - Welcome to 2738 23rd Ave, a 1930’s split-level 2 plus bedroom, 2 bath home in Reservoir Hills. The formal entry opens to the bright living & dining spaces, featuring beautiful parquet wood floors. Natural light pours into the living room through the expansive bay windows. The inviting fireplace & adjacent dining room beckon family & friends to gather.  The updated kitchen features granite counters, ample cabinet space & a delightful view of your lemon tree. Begin each day in the spacious breakfast room with its sweet built-in cabinet.  Up the short staircase you’ll find 2 generous bedrooms, each with views of the garden below. In the updated bathroom is a marble-tiled stall shower. The lower level of the home offers a finished bonus room with its own entry. This large & bright space features a subway tiled kitchenette with refrigerator & stove, as well as an en suite bathroom & direct level-out access to the garden. So many possibilities for this space: bedroom, office, family room.The attached garage has finished flooring that expands the options to fitness room, art studio, generous storage, and more. The covered carport offers sheltered exterior parking.Enjoy the fenced backyard with its perfect balance of grass, planting beds & patio. Close to restaurants, shops, 580 and 880.

Public Remarks: Discover the essence of modern living with timeless charm in this extensively renovated 4-bed 4-bath gem. This residence boasts an inviting open floorplan that effortlessly flows from the living area to the kitchen & dining space. Large Bow windows flood the space with abundant natural light. The piece de resistance is the gourmet kitchen which features sleek countertops & S/S appliances that elevate your culinary experience & an in-unit washer dryer exudes modern convenience. Step outside into your expansive, low-maintenance yard a tranquil retreat for relaxation and al fresco dining or just simply soak up the sun. The bonus spaces open endless possibilities - a dedicated home office, a creative art studio, or a serene yoga sanctuary. The long driveway that can comfortably accommodate 3+ cars, a rarity in the city. Nestled in the highly sought-after Reservoir Hill neighborhood, enjoy the peace & quiet of suburban living while maintaining easy access to all the urban amenities!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Katy Anderson - Agt: 510-637-8118 - Move-in ready Fruitvale bungalow! This charming home stands out with its pink paint and cheerful, landscaped front & back yards dotted w/colorful plants. The enclosed porch serves as a convenient mudroom or cozy sunroom. The original front door opens to a formal entryway. Original hardwood floors have been freshly refinished. The adjacent living room, with a gas-burning fireplace, offers a generous space for both living & dining areas. Craftsman details include original built-ins, large baseboards, & wood-framed windows. The modern open-concept floor plan features a fully renovated kitchen and bathroom. The kitchen boasts contemporary white cabinets, quartz countertops, Marmoleum flooring & a penny tile backsplash. The updated bathroom includes a wide single sink, modern mirror, light fixture & geometric tile floor. Each of the three bedrooms has large closets & cozy carpeting. Additional features include an interior dedicated laundry space, freshly painted interior, new lighting fixtures throughout & a brand-new roof. Sewer & sidewalk compliant! Conveniently located near: Fruitvale Public Market, La Farine Bakery, Guadalajara Restaurant & Tequila Bar, Philomena Pizza, Red Bay Coffee, Dimond Park, Sequoia Diner, Actual Café.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Chimene Pollard - 510-846-3601 - This charming home has been in the family for the last 49 years and now awaits the next lucky owner.  Sitting regally back from the street you are greeted w/a handsome gated front garden & expansive sunny porch. The interior has beautiful box-beamed ceilings, quaint built-ins, & bookshelves. You’ll find dining and cooking a delight in this well-appointed kitchen with a sweet eat-in breakfast nook, SS appliances, and upgraded backsplash, stone countertops, fixtures, and finishes. All 3 bedrooms are generously sized w/ ample closet space. Additional space off the kitchen is perfect as a hobby room or office & a laundry room w/ washer & dryer included . A spacious back garden with an orange tree, dining area, and sunny raised planting spaces – just awaiting a green thumb to make it green!  Recent updates include a new wall furnace (2023), a roof replacement in 2021, fresh interior paint, and updated carpets and flooring in the bedrooms, hallway, and office/laundry room. The property is enclosed with a stately front gate with off-street parking. Don't miss out on the opportunity to own this spacious and beautiful home near to neighborhood gems like Hasta Muerta Coffee, and William Wood Park and moments from Dimond Dist. w/shopping and restaurants.  OPEN SAT & SUN!

Remarks: Joy Mercedes - Agt: 510-502-7811 - 1924 ENCHANTING & DELIGHTFUL Dutch Colonial!The perfect setting for a period piece. let it beautifully surprise you at every turn.Prepare to be welcomed by open wrought iron entry gates & led playfully/willingly  to the secret garden..where  gentle breezes tousle the towering tree leaves in a canopy of greenery above your head..beckoning you deeper into the secluded paradise of brightly colored plants, fruits and flowers. Delicious plums, budding avocados, pineapple guava, mulberry bush, lemons, brightly hued purple potato vine, bird of paradise and more! Climbing the entry steps you discover an oversized cheerfully colored fucia/violet door calling you into the homes heart & soul.Glowing, original hardwood floors greet you  meandering every turn of light-filled harmony. Feel the spirit of a bygone era with the detailed, painted woodwork.Interior character abounds as Natural light softly filters into every aspect of this precious home:Foyer, main living room,original brick fireplace, oodles of sparkling windows, curvaceous iron stairway handrail, ridiculously high baseboards, formal dining rm, library,kitchen,back porch powder room.Its easy to see how the spirit of this home inspired the of the author and Aritist who flourished here for over 2 decades.Make it YOUR INSPIRATION!

Remarks: David Gunderman - 510-205-4369 - Gracefully set back from the street, this 2BD/1BA 1283 sq ft Traditional home features hardwood floors, open floor plan, sun-washed rooms, large lot, basement expansion potential, and dramatic bay windows. An elegant entry leads to the open space of the kitchen and the dining area is perfect for dinner parties. The cook’s kitchen boasts ample cabinetry and prep spaces, 4-burner gas stove, and stainless-steel sink. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Jennifer Collins - Agt: 925-997-2982 - Step into this contemporary 3-bedroom, 2-bath home that offers the perfect blend of modern conveniences & comfortable living. Nestled in a prime location, minutes from Lake Merritt, this home features an open layout, updated kitchen, bright and spacious rooms, and private backyard making it the ideal haven for relaxation and entertaining. The open-concept floor plan creates an inviting & airy ambiance between kitchen and living space. The modern kitchen has plenty of sleek storage, two stoves and dual ovens to try out new recipes. A spacious family room nestled at the back of the home is perfect for creating lasting memories with loved ones. It offers an abundance of natural light and seamlessly connects the indoor and outdoor living spaces. The three well-appointed bedrooms are designed for comfort and privacy and include custom closet organizers. The primary bedroom is a true retreat, privately located upstairs with an en-suite bathroom for added convenience. The private backyard is perfect for hosting gatherings, gardening, or simply enjoying the fresh air. This home is conveniently located near trendy dining options, vibrant entertainment, with easy access to highways and public transportation. Don't miss this modern gem mixed with historic charm!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Adele M Gillis - Agt: 510-332-5780 - Nestled among Oakland’s Reservoir Hills neighborhood, you’ll find a charming corner-lot home at 2701 Garden Street. Three bedrooms and one full bathroom.  Add to that a sunny, updated kitchen, with custom-made cabinetry, quartz counters and Miele dishwasher, opening to the dining and living rooms, with fireplace and built-ins.  Refinished hardwood floors glow throughout the home. A renovated bathroom features brushed brass fixtures and custom tile work.  A mudroom/laundry room, too! Private garden patios flank both sides of this home, perfect for indoor/outdoor entertaining. The right-side features a cozy, awning-covered patio and grassy area, and driveway with a sliding gate, for secure off-street parking. The left-side features a sweet landscaped retreat for the young and old alike (with a play structure!).  Flowering hydrangea, lavender, and roses mix in among delicious apple, fig, and Meyer lemon trees.  It's just what you'd expect on a Garden Street!  And the massive bonus!--Built as a carpenter's workshop, this space was framed out to accommodate a garage at the end of the driveway, with so many possibilities for future use.  A home office, gym, yoga studio... maybe even an ADU? Bring your imagination!  Nearby schools, markets, coffee and transportation. Welcome home!
Confidential Remarks: SUNDAY OPEN HOUSE 10/08, 2-4:30pm.  Call Adele for offer information or questions. Keys do not work to the laundry room door, so carry them with you just in case! PLEASE be sure all gates and doors are locked after showings, thank you! Square footage and lot size not verified or guaranteed by the Seller or Listing Agent.  DISCLOSURE PACKET LINK: https://app.disclosures.io/link/2701-Garden-Street-pl9gqpn6
